metaData.title: Testimonials
metaData.description: Hear from families I've had the honor of supporting on their journeys

headline: Stories from families I've had the honor of supporting.
intro: Every birth story is unique, and it's a privilege to be part of such transformative moments. Here's what some families have shared about their experience.

testimonials.quote: Amber was an amazing doula with skills that helped me during my labor. I highly recommend her!
testimonials.author: Maya

testimonials.quote: Absolutely loved Amber and would hire her again and again!! She truly made our birth experience so wonderful in that she was attentive to every need and she helped us to stick to our original birth plan that we had discussed weeks before the delivery. You are missing out if you don't use Amber for your next birth!
testimonials.author: Lauren

testimonials.quote: Amber was amazing from the beginning to the end! From the planning stages until after delivery, I am so blessed to have had Amber by my side. She prayed over me during delivery which helped me remain calm and focused. She helped me hold my twins since I wasn’t able to do it by myself during delivery. She took pictures of the birth and the twins first hour while I was still being stitched up. She checked in on me and the twins frequently even months after delivery. She’s been a blessing to know and I am forever grateful for her.
testimonials.author: Jesse

testimonials.quote: Amber answered EVERY question I asked, and was responsive to all of my concerns, weird feelings, etc. She is a wealth of information, and provided reputable documented sources so I felt confident in my choices. I would not have been as comfortable during my labor had she not been there to suggest labor positions and coach my husband on how to ease my pain and discomfort. Her positive energy and support as I made difficult choices during my labor that were not "part of my plan" really made all the difference in the world. I would recommend Amber to absolutely everyone, for pregnancy, postpartum and beyond.
testimonials.author: J.M.
